overview: It's well known that country girls are fucking mad for it, this is mainly due to there being fuck all to do in the sticks other than screw around, so join Pure XXX Films as they visit the countryside and see what all those filthy farmer's daughters get up to when daddy is dipping the sheep. Onr thing for sure, if you are a farm hand on one of these farms, the fields are not the only thing they are going to be plowing!
title: Fuck the Farmers Daughter
